content: plus 2 chains between legs = 26 sts row 9 single_crochet 6 increase on the 7th st single_crochet 12 increase single_crochet 6 28 sts row 10 increase single_crochet 13 increase single_crochet 13 30 sts row 11 13 single_crochet 30 sts row 14 single_crochet 4 decrease sc8 decrease x2 sc4 27 sts row 15 single_crochet 7 decrease x 3 24 sts row 16 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease x 2 single_crochet 3 21 sts row 17 single_crochet in each st 21 sts row 18 single_crochet 5 decrease x 3 18 sts fasten_off leave long tail for sewing note the measurements for the head is 3 tall and for the body with legs is 4 tall you may need to add another row or two if your body is too short rabbit ears make 2 row 1 6 single_crochet into magic loop join and work in the round row 2 increase single_crochet in every st around 12 sts row 3 7 single_crochet around 12 sts row 8 single_crochet 4 decrease x 2 10 sts row 9 12 single_crochet around 10 sts bear ears modification row 1 6 single_crochet into magic loop join and work in the round row 2 increase single_crochet in every st around 12 sts row 3 1 single_crochet increase repeat 18 sts row 4 5 single_crochet around 18 sts arms make 2 row 1 6 single_crochet into magic loop join and work in the round row 2 single_crochet 1 increase x 3 9 sts row 3 8 single_crochet in each st 9 sts stuff until row 6 7 so arms can be a little floppy row 9 single_crochet 1 decrease x 3 6 sts row 10 11 single_crochet in each st 6 sts fasten_off assemble sew ears to top of head sew face features sew head to body add arms to side as you go
